short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects you from twitter to web-sites, replacing short links when you click links, cause short links may be blocked by provider.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Redirects you from twitter to external web-sites, replacing short links (such as t.co, bit.ly and etc.) when you click links, 'cause short links services may be blocked by provider.
